Adar Naomi Kaplan, a daughter of Leslie Kaplan and Dr. Lawrence W. Kaplan of Old Westbury, N.Y., is to be married today to Jacob George Novak, a son of Melva Novak and Dr. David Novak of Toronto. The bridegroom's father, an ordained rabbi, is to perform the ceremony at the Shelter Rock Jewish Center in Roslyn, N.Y.
Mrs. Novak, 23, is a fact checker at Brill's Content magazine in New York. She graduated from Cornell University. Her father is a dentist in Lindenhurst, N.Y.

Mr. Novak, 29, is a segment producer for ''Before Hours'' at CNNfn, the cable television network in New York. He received bachelor's degrees from Columbia and the Jewish Theological Seminary and a master's degree in journalism from Northwestern. His father holds the J. Richard and Dorothy Shiff chair of Jewish studies at the University of Toronto. His mother teaches French at Or Chaim Yeshiva High School in Toronto.
